price: Say, “Allah rescues you from it and from every distress, yet you associate partners with Him.”
arabic: قُلِ ٱللَّهُ يُنَجِّيكُم مِّنۡهَا وَمِن كُلِّ كَرۡبٖ ثُمَّ أَنتُمۡ تُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
